string.name: what_s_new_toast
string.font:
- Resolved an issue where the settings icon was not visible in the paid version of the app. 
 - Made subtle yet meaningful UI improvements. 
 - Introduced a user-friendly swipe gesture to seamlessly adjust volume & brightness, offering an intuitive and efficient control experience. 
 - Positioned the controller lock feature at a more accessible and convenient location 
 - Introducing a variety of stunning Album Art styles! You can now customize your experience by selecting your favorite style from the Personalize Screen. 
 - Say goodbye to the conventional white/dark themes of the Console! Audiofy now features the all-new Ambient Mode, showcasing an exquisite blend of intricate blurs and vibrant color combinations for a truly captivating visual experience. 
 - Introduced multiple options for selecting the Accent Color, including manual selection and wallpaper-based choices.

item.font:
We've enhanced the functionality of the app. 
 We're utilizing the new, advanced NowPlaying API for real-time updates regarding playback metadata state. 
 We've added a new Dynamic Widget that automatically adjusts to size. 
 More App Widget styles are coming soon.
